headline: Dire Straits
abstract: For his new book, “Extreme Economies,” Richard Davies visited nine struggling places — from a Louisiana prison to the Panamanian rain forest — to glean economic lessons for all of us.
lead_paragraph: EXTREME ECONOMIES What Life at the World’s Margins Can Teach Us About Our Own FutureBy Richard Davies
keywords: Extreme Economies: What Life at the World's Margins Can Teach Us About Our Own Future (Book)
